    • maze.logic.Maze
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that defines the main maze logic.
    Author:
    Diogo Trindade, Rui Vilares
    See Also:

        Constructs and initializes maze with several dragons.
        Parameters:
        size - Board size
        dragonMode - Dragon mode (idle, move, sleep)
        dragonSpitFire - Spit Fire mode active or not
        nDragons - number of dragons to create
        nDarts - number of darts to create
